00041 #include "egs_base_geometry.h"
00042 #include "egs_geometry_tester.h"
00043 #include "egs_input.h"
00044 #include "egs_functions.h"
00045 
00046 #include <iostream>
00047 using namespace std;
00048 
00049 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00050 
00051     if( argc < 2 ) egsFatal("Usage: %s input_file\n",argv[0]);
00052 
00053     EGS_Input input; input.setContentFromFile(argv[1]);
00054     //input.print(0,cout);
00055     EGS_BaseGeometry *g = EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry(&input);
00056     if( !g ) egsFatal("\nGot a null geometry? Check your input file\n\n");
00057     EGS_BaseGeometry::describeGeometries();
00058 
00059     EGS_GeometryTester *tester = EGS_GeometryTester::getGeometryTester(&input);
00060 
00061     tester->testInside(g);
00062     tester->testInsideTime(g);
00063     tester->testHownear(20,g);
00064     tester->testHownearTime(g);
00065     tester->testHowfar(g);
00066     tester->testHowfarTime(g);
00067 
00068     delete tester;
00069 
00070     return 0;
00071 
00072 }
